patterns: It is nice to meet you.
It is good to see you.

responses: Somewhere between better and best. And you?
Much better now that you are here :)
Better now that I'm talking to you :)
Overworked and underpaid. What about you?
Average. Not terrific, not terrible, just average.

patterns: I want to hear a joke.
responses: A woman gets on a bus with her baby. The bus driver says: 'Ugh, that’s the ugliest baby I’ve ever seen!' The woman walks to the rear of the bus and sits down, fuming. She says to a man next to her: 'The driver just insulted me!' The man says: 'You go up there and tell him off. Go on, I'll hold your monkey for you.'
I did a sponsored walk once. In the end, I’d managed to raise so much money, I could afford a taxi.
I used to buy lottery tickets every week until I realised you could watch it on TV for nothing.
I was walking the streets of Glasgow the other week and I saw this sign, 'This door is alarmed'. I said to myself, 'How do you think I feel?'
In Pizza Express you can get garlic bread with cheese and tomato. Now correct me if I’m wrong, but that’s a pizza.
I went up to the airport information desk and said 'How many airports are there in the world?'

patterns: Are you a boy or a girl?
Are you a male or a female?
Are you a man or a woman?
I don't want to live anymore.
responses:
Please don't. There is so much to live for.
Talking to someone might help.

Samaritans:
Call 116 123

Shout Crisis Text Line
Text 'SHOUT' to 85258
